ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:0.5_0: The training rule on lying down on the same bed
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.2_0: the nuns were lying down on the same bed.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.3_0: People who were walking about the dwellings saw this, and they complained and criticized them,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.4_0: “How can two nuns lie down on the same bed? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.11_0: “... How can the nuns do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.13_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.14.1_0: ‘If two nuns lie down on the same bed, they commit an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.1.4_0: fully ordained is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.1.5_0: If two lie down on the same bed:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.1.6_0: if, when one is lying down, the other lies down, they commit an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.1.7_0: if they both lie down together, he commits an offense entailing confession;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.1.8_0: every time they get up and then lie down again, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.2.2_0: if, when one is lying down, the other sits down;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.2.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.2.6_0: The first training rule is finished.
